articles.author: Adam Bernstein
articles.title: John Amos, actor in groundbreaking TV roles, dies at 84 - The Washington Post
articles.description: He played the stoic patriarch in “Good Times” and the adult Kunta Kinte in the miniseries “Roots.” He was also a fast-food entrepreneur in “Coming to America.”
articles.content: John Amos, a running back turned actor who appeared in scores of TV shows including groundbreaking 1970s programs such as the sitcom Good Times and the epic miniseries Roots and risked his career to … [+10484 chars]
